ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.orgPayload map (data, index) -> { "Account Name" : lookup('lookupFlow', {AccountId : payload},10000000), "Contract Term (months)": data."Contract Term (months)", "Customer Signed Date": data."Customer Signed Date" as Date {format : "yyyy-MM-dd"}, "Contract Start Date": data."Contract Start Date" as Date {format : "yyyy-MM-dd"}, "Status": data.Status, "Id" : data.Id }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if ((payload[0].created is true) and payload[0].success is true) 201 else if ((payload[0].created is false) and payload[0].success is true) 200 else 500
